name: Font Viewer
description: GNOME Font Viewer is an application to view fonts. It allows users to view and browse all installed fonts. And the font details can also be viewed.

en_US.description: GNOME Font Viewer is an application to view fonts. It allows users to view and browse all installed fonts. And the font details can also be viewed.
en_US.name: Font Viewer

zh_CN.description: 字体查看器是一个查看字体的应用程序，它允许用户查看和浏览所有已安装的字体，同时可以查看字体的详细信息。
zh_CN.name: 字体查看器
